title: Research on transgender children still in its infancy
description: The past decade has seen a dramatic shift in the way doctors and therapists treat transgender children. But even as doctors work to create new standards of care, there are few studies and empirical data to help shape those guidelines.
seo_title: Research on transgender children still in its infancy
author: ryan kost, lucio villa
twitter_text: Research on transgender children still in its infancy as doctors work on guidelines for care.
